Package entity

Class Order

java.lang.Object
entity.Order
public class Order extends Object
Order class to store the order details. Represents an order placed by a customer, including the status, order items, time elapsed since order placement, whether it is takeaway or dine-in, and total price.
Since:
2024-04-26
Version:
1.0
Author:
Denzel Elden Wijaya, Federrico Hansen Budianto, Melisa Lee, Rivaldo Billy Sebastian
